about_the_game:
Introduction

How to make a game from 0 to 1 and publish it on Steam? This video diary game will let you find it out. Watch videos to learn about the process; Make choices and live with the possible consequences; What you're watching is how the game you're playing was made. What you choose will affect the game you playing. The game process is not long, because it is easy to make a game with a short process and put it on Steam platform, so the process is shorter, so it is easier to make this game, so the process is shorter, so...

Main Content

  • Generate game ideas
  • Overcome procrastination and quickly create a main menu
  • Easy way to make a video diary game
  • Make save and load system
  • Put in hidden elements
  • Achievement system
  • Publish the game on Steam
  • etc.

Feedback

  • I play this game on Steam to learn how to list it on Steam, I play this game to learn how to make this game, and then I play this game and destroy this game.——Joshua
  • I tried it, and I actually got a game on the Steam following this process!——A game producer.
